original: @39b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang byug gis /
analyzed: @39b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang byug gis /
translated: by Avalokite≈õvara

analyzed: dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la springs pa'i phrin yig / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sngon 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang ; / dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu gnyis dang por byang chub kyi mchog tu sems bskyed de grogs por 'thams nas /üîΩgang gis lam sdon du grub pa des /

translated: In the past, the noble Avalokite≈õvara and the monk Praj√±ƒÅvarman first generated the supreme mind of awakening and became friends.

original: cig shos la bstang bar dam bcas pa las /
analyzed: cig shos la bstang bar dam bcas pa las /
translated: They made a pact that whoever reached awakening first would help the other.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lam sdon du grub ste /üîΩdge slong @40a * //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lam sdon du grub ste / dge slong @40a * //
translated: The noble Avalokite≈õvara reached awakening first.

original: rab gsal gzhon nu la bstad ba'i phyir phrin yig gis bzlugs pa /
analyzed: rab gsal gzhon nu la bstad ba'i phyir phrin yig gis bzlugs pa /
translated: In order to help the monk Praj√±ƒÅvarman, he sent him a letter:

original: grogs khyod ci ste 'am dam bcas brjed dam ci //
analyzed: grogs khyod ci ste 'am dam bcas brjed dam ci //
translated: ‚ÄúFriend, have you forgotten your promise?

original: 'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra 'di la ci zhig chags //
analyzed: 'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra 'di la ci zhig chags //
translated: What is your attachment to these desires, which are like a pit of burning embers?

original: shin tu skyo ba'i yid kyis rab tu mi 'bad par //
analyzed: shin tu skyo ba'i yid kyis rab tu mi 'bad par //
translated: With a mind of great weariness, you must strive

original: srid rgyu 'dod pa da dung gang ba ga la srid //
analyzed: srid rgyu 'dod pa da dung gang ba ga la srid //
translated: How could there be any possibility of filling up the desire for existence?

original: theg pa mchog gis des 'byung 'gro ba'i don byos la //
analyzed: theg pa mchog gis des 'byung 'gro ba'i don byos la //
translated: You should work for the benefit of beings by means of the supreme vehicle.

original: rgyu dang kha gsag drag pa nyid la mi gdung zhing //
analyzed: rgyu dang kha gsag drag pa nyid la mi gdung zhing //
translated: Do not be distressed by the cause, flattery, and harshness.

original: 'gro las rnam grol lam la myur du ma 'bad na //
analyzed: 'gro las rnam grol lam la myur du ma 'bad na //
translated: If you do not quickly strive on the path to liberation from samsara,

original: dus gsum rgyal bas bskyab dka' phan thag chad du 'ong //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal bas bskyab dka' phan thag chad du 'ong //
translated: it will be difficult for the victors of the three times to protect you, and you will be left behind.

original: rtog med rtog bral dus gsum thub pa kun gshegs shul //
analyzed: rtog med rtog bral dus gsum thub pa kun gshegs shul //
translated: The path of the buddhas of the three times is free from concepts and free from conceptualization.

original: phra shing shes dka' tshig gi spyod yul ma yin yang /
analyzed: phra shing shes dka' tshig gi spyod yul ma yin yang /
translated: It is subtle, difficult to know, and not within the domain of words.

original: phyogs tsam rtog pas sgro btags rgyal ba'i mthus brjod na //
analyzed: phyogs tsam rtog pas sgro btags rgyal ba'i mthus brjod na //
translated: However, through the power of the victorious ones, I will express it with conceptual thoughts.

original: shin tu legs par rab nyon yid la gzung nus sam //
analyzed: shin tu legs par rab nyon yid la gzung nus sam //
translated: Can you listen very well and retain it in your mind?

original: dge slong rab gsal gzhon nus slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gsol pa /
analyzed: dge slong rab gsal gzhon nus slar yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gsol pa /
translated: The monk Prakasha Kumar again supplicated noble Avalokiteshvara:

original: mtho la mtho sems mi mdzad mnyam la 'gran mi mdza' //
analyzed: mtho la mtho sems mi mdzad mnyam la 'gran mi mdza' //
translated: You do not have a high mind towards the high, do not compete with equals,

original: dma' la rdan can mi mdzad yongs la snyoms pa'i mgon //
analyzed: dma' la rdan can mi mdzad yongs la snyoms pa'i mgon //
translated: do not despise the low, and are a protector who is impartial towards all.

original: dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lam mer bzhugs pa yi //
analyzed: dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lam mer bzhugs pa yi //
translated: ‚ÄúWhere is the hero who blazes with a thousand lights?

original: mdangs bzang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag da ltar gang na bzhugs //
analyzed: mdangs bzang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag da ltar gang na bzhugs //
translated: Where is the lord of compassion, the one with the beautiful luster?

original: khri lan bdud ris 'pham mdzad thar pa'i lam ston gsol //
analyzed: khri lan bdud ris 'pham mdzad thar pa'i lam ston gsol //
translated: Please speak, the one who has defeated the hordes of MƒÅra and shows the path to liberation.

original: nyes bcu tha ba'i rdul bral stobs bcu rtsal 'phags gson //
analyzed: nyes bcu tha ba'i rdul bral stobs bcu rtsal 'phags gson //
translated: Please listen, the one who is free from the dust of the ten faults and has perfected the ten powers.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen gyur skyob pa dam pa gson //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen gyur skyob pa dam pa gson //
translated: Please listen, the one who is the friend of the three worlds and the supreme protector.

original: dpa' brtan bdud las shin tu mtshams med gcig tu brtan pa gson //
analyzed: dpa' brtan bdud las shin tu mtshams med gcig tu brtan pa gson //
translated: Please listen, the one who is steadfast and has defeated MƒÅra, the one who is firmly established in the one-sided.

original: bdag ni mun bcas bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa ste ;
analyzed: bdag ni mun bcas bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa ste ;
translated: I am caught in the noose of MƒÅra, who is shrouded in darkness,

original: / thar pa'i lam stor 'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams lags na //
analyzed: / thar pa'i lam stor 'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams lags na //
translated: I have lost the path to liberation and wander in the wilderness of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: cis 'dul gar legs thabs kyis myur du mi skyob par //
analyzed: cis 'dul gar legs thabs kyis myur du mi skyob par //
translated: Without quickly protecting me with whatever methods are necessary,

original: dus rings bgrangs kyi bar du mgon khyod ci la gzhes //
analyzed: dus rings bgrangs kyi bar du mgon khyod ci la gzhes //
translated: for how long, O protector, will you remain indifferent?

original: lha dang mi yi khyu mchog tshogs rab mtha' yas dgongs //
analyzed: lha dang mi yi khyu mchog tshogs rab mtha' yas dgongs //
translated: Please consider the infinite assembly of the best among gods and humans.

original: mu stegs kha brgya pham mdzad skyes bu seng ge dgongs //
analyzed: mu stegs kha brgya pham mdzad skyes bu seng ge dgongs //
translated: Please consider, O lion among men, the one who has defeated the hundred-fold non-Buddhists.‚Äù

original: yid bzhin dbyig gi rtog ltar re ba kun skong dgongs //
analyzed: yid bzhin dbyig gi rtog ltar re ba kun skong dgongs //
translated: Like a wish-fulfilling gem, you fulfill all hopes.

original: thugs rje chu bo rgyun 'babs rgyal sras thu bo dgongs //
analyzed: thugs rje chu bo rgyun 'babs rgyal sras thu bo dgongs //
translated: You are the eldest son of the victors, with the river of compassion flowing.

original: srid gsum sgyu mar chos bstan ngo bo med bzhin du //
analyzed: srid gsum sgyu mar chos bstan ngo bo med bzhin du //
translated: You taught the Dharma as an illusion of the three existences, while being essentially non-existent.

original: bden spangs log pa'i lam zhugs srid pa'i lam zhugs pa //
analyzed: bden spangs log pa'i lam zhugs srid pa'i lam zhugs pa //
translated: Abandoning the truth, entering the wrong path, entering the path of existence,

original: 'khor ba'i gdos can grangs med bskyab @40b kyi mi lang zhes //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i gdos can grangs med bskyab @40b kyi mi lang zhes //
translated: The countless beings of samsara are not able to be protected.

original: dang che lha yi thugs kyang skyo bar rung mod kyi //
analyzed: dang che lha yi thugs kyang skyo bar rung mod kyi //
translated: Even the great gods' minds are filled with sorrow.

original: 'on kyang legs rgyu chos nyid bzod nas mya ngan 'das don du //
analyzed: 'on kyang legs rgyu chos nyid bzod nas mya ngan 'das don du //
translated: However, having endured the truth of the cause of goodness, for the sake of nirvana,

original: 'gro ba yongs kyi ched la go bgos mdzad lags kyis //
analyzed: 'gro ba yongs kyi ched la go bgos mdzad lags kyis //
translated: You have taken on the armor for the sake of all beings.

original: mgon po rab gsal gzhon nu rjes dgongs nyag sring zhing //
analyzed: mgon po rab gsal gzhon nu rjes dgongs nyag sring zhing //
translated: O protector, like a clear young sun, with compassion,

original: thugs rje'i thugs kyis bzod pa bzhes te bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: thugs rje'i thugs kyis bzod pa bzhes te bskyab tu gsol //
translated: Please accept my apology and protect me.

original: stobs mchog dpal gyi mgur nas yi ge 'brus bsnyad pa //
analyzed: stobs mchog dpal gyi mgur nas yi ge 'brus bsnyad pa //
translated: The syllables spoken from the glorious throat of supreme strength

original: mkha' la tshon bkye bzhin du spyod yul ma lags pas //
analyzed: mkha' la tshon bkye bzhin du spyod yul ma lags pas //
translated: Are not within the realm of experience, like colors spread in the sky.

original: rgyal sras 'khor bcas rnams kyis gsal bar ma bstan na //
analyzed: rgyal sras 'khor bcas rnams kyis gsal bar ma bstan na //
translated: If the Bodhisattvas and their retinues do not clearly teach it,

original: bdag 'dra mtshan mar 'dzin pas gzung bar ga la nus //üîΩ'on kyang don gyi dam pa srid pa'i dpyis 'byin pa //
analyzed: bdag 'dra mtshan mar 'dzin pas gzung bar ga la nus // 'on kyang don gyi dam pa srid pa'i dpyis 'byin pa //
translated: how can someone like me, who grasps at signs, possibly understand it?üîΩNevertheless, in order to take to my crown this most excellent meaning,

original: gdams ngag bka' drin mchog 'di spyi bor blang slad du //
analyzed: gdams ngag bka' drin mchog 'di spyi bor blang slad du //
translated: which uproots existence, this most kind instruction,

original: ci nus sems kyi rtsal gyis log par gzung mi bgyid //
analyzed: ci nus sems kyi rtsal gyis log par gzung mi bgyid //
translated: I will not grasp it wrongly with the power of my mind, to the best of my ability.

original: bla ma'i sar bzhugs che ba'i mthus kyang bstad du gsol //üîΩ'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs gis ;
analyzed: bla ma'i sar bzhugs che ba'i mthus kyang bstad du gsol // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs gis ;
translated: I request you, who dwell on the guru‚Äôs level, to correct me through your great power.

original: dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la springs pa'i phrin yig rdzogs so /
analyzed: dge slong rab gsal gzhon nu la springs pa'i phrin yig rdzogs so /
translated: This is the end of the letter sent to the bhik·π£u PravrajyƒÅkumƒÅra by ƒÄrya Avalokite≈õvara.
